modName: Nightingale Bikini - Standalone UNP UNPB BBP
summary: Standalone version of Tiwa44's Nightingale Bikini
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=5][center]Now included in my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68846/?]Spicy Wardrobe[/url] mod.[/center][/size][/u]

ATTENTION: For HDT users, i fixed the routes for the HDT functionality on the cape. I'm unable to test it right now. please download and see if it works for you. Thanks in advance :)

[u]-BETA version - please, report ANY bugs[/u]
[/b]-Update: Added UNPB conversions by MrTroublemaker. Edited the UNP file to remove a esp duplicate.
-The version number from now on will match that of the original mod

This is a standalone version of Tiwa44's Nightingale Bikini Armor, available [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60636/?]HERE[/url]. It is compatible with it, in case you want to have both or you want to craft them for companions, mannequins or whatever.

The armor can be crafted under [u]misc[/u] section and requires only 1 void salts. It has the original enchantments (Maxed out) and is temperable (1 void salt each) It is, of course, Light Armor.
If you think it's unbalanced... Well, you have the replacer version :)

Honestly, this is a goddamn overpowered bikini...

Enjoy (^.^)

Options:
-Normal UNP, no BBP
-UNP with BBP
-Normal UNPB, no BBP
-UNPB with BBP
-Unenchanted version, requires main mod

BBWhat? What is all this?
BBP essentialy means Bouncing Breasts. You need to install this [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]mod[/url] (Physics Extension) and then this [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]other[/url] (Compatible Skeleton) to make it work. I don't like it very much, but have it installed because a lot of cool armors use it. If you're not sure what to download, just go for the regular versions. 

UNPB versions thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/927644/?]MrTroublemaker[/url]. His original mod is available [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60771/?]here[/url]. Keep in mind that it requires tiwa's original replacer.

Future plans:
-Provide support for conversions. Please, post requests and i'll ask permissions. There are too many body mods/conversions out there. Also, keep in mind that, since there are no custom textures, replacing the meshes is fairly simple so it wont take long. I can't test them, though, since i only use regular UNP, so i'll have to rely on you guys to test any other body mod conversion.

The house mod in the screenshots is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53226/?]Moonwatch Manor Returns[/url] by Elianora. My character is a [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]Ningheim[/url].

Thanks to:
-Tiwa44 for the mod and the request.
-MrTroublemaker for the UNPB version.
-All the people that appreciated my previous work and requested this version. There you go guys :)
-Trevor Morris, for the DA Inquisition music playing while i was making this. I tested DA Inquisition for EA this summer and i was utterly impressed by its music.
And of course, Bethesda for Skyrim and all that.
author: Tiwa44 - MrTroublemaker - Standalone by Zarrastro
